cards.title: Wooden Fences
cards.content: Wooden fences are easy to install, versatile and visually appealing. Choose from a variety of lumber materials, fence styles and fence toppers.

cards.title: Chain Link Fences
cards.content: Chain Link fences are made of robust galvanized mesh and metal posts. It is a durable and cost effective option that can be built at different heights.

cards.title: Vinyl Fences
cards.content: Vinyl fences are made from PVC, which is a strong and durable material. Vinyl is easy to clean and maintain and resists warping, splintering and rotting.

cards.title: Boxed Wire Fences
cards.content: Boxed Wire fences consists of wood box frames with metal mesh and wood posts. This option is both effective and aesthetically pleasing.

cards.title: Gates
cards.content: Add a wooden, chainlink or vinyl gate. Choose from single gates, double swing gates or sliding gates and customize your gate with toppers in a variety of styles.

cards.title: Staining
cards.content: Customize the color of your wooden fence to match your home. Staining also helps prolong the lifespan of your wooden fence  Choose from a variety of colors and opacity.
